name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the early morning of May 26, on the streets of Chaozhou, Guangdong.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 24, a lawyer posted on Weibo that a judgment from the People's Court of Yuedai District, Tai'an, Shandong, was stamped with the seal of the Shandong Tai'an Intermediate People's Court.
On the 25th, Zhang Xuefeng, the defense lawyer in the case, said that two judgments were delivered, one of which was delivered electronically on the morning of the 24th, and this one was stamped with the seal of the Intermediate Court.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @nbzhuo8964 Tsai Ing-wen was also blocked when she was elected in 2016.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 24, Beijing Youth Daily reported: "Mother with Alzheimer's disease is left unattended, and the 45-year-old middle-aged only child takes her to work."
Comment: China has not established a corresponding social welfare system and pension system after implementing the family planning policy. With the arrival of a deeply aging society, the continued absence of a welfare pension system and the continuous deterioration of the financial situation, these problems will become increasingly serious.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 24, a boy died in the bathroom of the East District of North China University of Technology. The family of the deceased was blocked outside the school gate and smashed the door in anger.
According to classmates, this is not the first case of a student's death on campus this year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/WXaizYelD8

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Previously, students of this school had found rat heads in their food in the cafeteria.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 25th is International Missing Children's Day. However, the parents who traveled thousands of miles to find their children were placed under house arrest by the local government when they were searching for their missing children and promoting anti-trafficking efforts in Heze, Shandong Province.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 26, Changsha, Hunan. The Taiping Heavenly Kingdom statues in Tianxin Pavilion were removed. 
Relevant staff of the Changsha Tianxin District People's Government Office said that the scenic spot is currently undergoing quality improvement and renovation, so this group of Taiping Army soldiers' sculptures were "temporarily moved for protection."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 26, Chongqing. Due to heavy rain the night before, the Tuzhu Tunnel, which had been open to traffic for less than three years, began to leak.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to the latest data from China's Ministry of Commerce, in the first four months of this year, total foreign direct investment (FDI) in China fell 27.9% year-on-year. Last month's data showed that in the first three months of this year, total FDI in China fell 26.1% year-on-year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to a report on May 24, the National Health Commission and other departments proposed to strive to achieve an annual increase of more than 10% in the number of registered organ donors in the next five years, and to achieve a donation rate of 8% per million people nationwide within five years.
As soon as the news came out, netizens went to the comment section of the official Douyin account of the National Health Commission to leave messages, calling on those within the system to take the lead in donating organs.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Follow-up of the dormitory fire at Communication University of China: The school's rumor-busting triggered student doubts, and students said "I am ashamed of Communication University of China". Some teachers accused students of being inconsiderate of the school.
On May 26, Communication University of China issued a statement to refute the rumor, saying that the dormitory fire the day before was caused by a power bank, and no one was trapped or injured at the scene. There was no such situation as "smoke detectors did not alarm, fire hydrants failed", etc.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Photos of the fire scene
Photos of students in hospital
Students explain why power banks spontaneously combust and cause fires
Students say this is the second fire in six months and fire prevention notices at the fire scene

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 26, owners of the first section of Sunshine City Datang Tanjing in Nanning, Guangxi went to the property sales office to defend their rights and held banners to call on Xi Jinping to make decisions for the people.
It is reported that the property was originally scheduled to be delivered on September 30 last year, and now only three or two workers are performing a show of returning to work every day.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 25, in Pingdingshan, Henan, a woman and her husband encountered a man standing by a bridge and trying to commit suicide by jumping off the bridge. The man said that the company didn't want him anymore, his daughter couldn't wait any longer, and he didn't want to live anymore.
In the end, the man was pulled up by everyone.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 25, blogger "Unknown Knight" visited a legless man who had lived in a rural area in Hebei for 30 years. According to reports, the man worked in a nearby coal mine with his younger brother when he was young. A collapse accident caused one of the man's legs to be broken. In order to get more compensation, his younger brother sawed off his brother's other leg. In the end, he did not get the compensation money, and the younger brother disappeared from the world.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 25, large characters were posted on a window in Tianjin's Heping District, calling on Xi Jinping to pay attention to the Heping District Human Resources and Social Security Bureau's abuse of power and persecution of demobilized soldiers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the early morning of May 26, a man was seen wandering on the street between Tongjiang Street and Central Street in Harbin with a knife, and then took a female hostage and a taxi. The police fired five shots at him but failed to subdue him, and the man then drove away from the scene.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/xsOHwCV8pu

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 25, in Kunming, Yunnan, the owners of Danuo Ark in the Economic Development Zone posted a video saying that they came to the city from the countryside to work hard and used up their life savings to buy a house in the real estate project. As a result, the house is now unfinished and they are forced to live in an unfinished building with no water or electricity.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Who is telling the truth?"
On May 25, Guangzhou TV released a video saying that Sanyuanli Village banned "electric chickens" from entering the village for a week, and residents said that the overall situation has improved.
However, many local people in the comment area questioned the authenticity of the interview.
Previously, there were reports that local landlords and restaurant owners said that since the implementation of the new regulations, the streets have been deserted and many have moved away.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 24, the Ministry of Public Security required the hotel industry not to refuse to receive foreign personnel on the grounds that they lack foreign-related qualifications.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 26, it was reported online that a general technology teacher surnamed Xu from Zhejiang Shaoxing No. 1 Middle School made inappropriate comments and dirty jokes in class and made obscene gestures during breaks, which caused dissatisfaction among students.
A student added him on WeChat and asked him why he made such comments in class, and the teacher replied with three shy emojis.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 25, in the Jinmao Yue Community in Jiangning, Nanjing, Jiangsu, the owners blocked the road and demanded to see the mayor because the large trucks driving around every night seriously disturbed the residents.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Beijing Chaoyang Fire Department did not mention Communication University of China in its fire report.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
As the 35th anniversary of June 4th approaches, we cooperate with Human Rights in China @hrichina and Humanitarian China @HChina89 to release a series of special photos of June 4th. Scene of the 1989 Democracy Movement No. 14 (May 26)
[The Workers’ Autonomous Federation was established] [launched second hunger strike] [reported on Zhao Ziyang’s five crimes]
